title: Skin Trading
body:
I am not sure if this fits in this category but please read below
Skin trading an idea my friends and I thought of, basically you request to trade a skin with one of your friends if the accept you trade. This idea is only a foundation many more additions could be made. If you have an idea please make a suggestion and lets bring this feature to league of legends

replies.body: You and your friends did not come up with it, this has been requested for years...
what would u give me for my _happy_ elf teemo skin :^) sgu? pfe?

I'm pretty sure if you look in one of these posts they were saying how you could earlier in the game of league but now they took it out.. not that original of a idea but still would be nice to trade skins that you don't want but then again hacking would be more worth it, they could take all your stuff.. oh how good things come at a price :c
